simple.io
Class ByteBuffer

java.lang.Object
  simple.io.ByteBuffer

public class ByteBuffer
extends java.lang.Object

Byte buffer utilizing a circular array that can auto-grow.
Created: 2006

Author:
Kenneth Pierce
